); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ clearItem: (item) => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), addItem: (item) => dispatch(addItem(item)), removeItem: (item) => dispatch(removeItem(item)), }); export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutP);
